thread.title: Recipe: Kathi Kabab Roll

title: Recipe: Kathi Kabab Roll
text:
How to make Kathi Kabab Roll Step 1 
Combine all the marinade ingredients in a bowl. Add the mutton pieces(boneless mutton cut into bite-sized chunks) and mix well. Keep the bowl in the fridge for 4 hours and marinate the mutton pieces. Step 2 
Heat oil in a frying pan over medium flame. Remove the mutton from the fridge. Sprinkle salt and keep aside for 5 to 10 minutes. Step 3 
Fry the mutton pieces in hot oil until browned. Remove and transfer them to a plate. Step 4 
Keep only 1 tsp oil in the pan and add the fried mutton pieces. Add butter and a little water. Reduce heat to low and cook, covered, for 10 minutes or until the mutton pieces are tender and cooked. Step 5 
Remove when the moisture has evaporated. Add juice of 1/2 lemon and keep aside in a warm place. Step 6 
Heat a tawa over medium flame. Warm the parathas till hot and crisp. Step 7 
Place a large spoonful of the mutton mixture on one side of the paratha. Add some onions, mint leaves and coriander leaves. Sprinkle some chaat masala and little lime juice. Step 8
